tool_description: Japanese Dictionary, Kanji dictionary and morphological analyser combined into one convenient GraphQL API. Can break down a Japanese text into words and words into kanji.
name: Japanese Text Analysis
title: Japanese Text Analysis

api_list.name: graphQL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://japanese-text-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "japanese-text-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://japanese-text-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "japanese-text-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
